posts.post_content:
I'm looking for a 1909 Obak Howard (Los Angeles), without the frame on the back.

If anyone has one available, please let me know.  Thank you.

Steve

Still looking for this card.

Steve

You're in luck, kind of. I just finished a player set of the 1909 Obaks and have some dupes, amongst them a raw Howard with no frame. It's in poor condition, darkened by time and stained by something, maybe a kid's science project a hundred years ago. Otherwise would fill the puka adequately until a better copy appears. No charge. Happy to help you out. I'll post some scans tomorrow.

My scanner is giving me aggro. These snapshots will have to suffice. PM me with your address and I will mail it out as soon as Canada Post comes off their strike which may be as soon as tomorrow, fingers-crossed.
